themes: equity and inclusion in funding distribution
transparency and community involvement in evaluation
accessibility and simplification of application processes
key_phrases: funding should be more widely distributed
transparent evaluation criteria and diverse review panels
expanded outreach and education, including multilingual materials
flexible funding models, such as multi-year general operating support
solutions_proposed: wider distribution of funding across organizations of varying sizes, disciplines, and cultural backgrounds
transparent evaluation criteria and diverse review panels including community voices
simplified and accessible application processes with tiered requirements
expanded outreach and education with multilingual materials and neighborhood-based info sessions
flexible funding models such as multi-year support, rapid-response grants, and collaborative project support
increased investment in subsidized venues, rehearsal spaces, and long-term leases for cultural use
ongoing feedback loops for grantees and applicants
